    • Constructor Detail

      • Receipt

        public Receipt(java.util.ArrayList<Product> listProd,
               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> listQ,
               Client b,
               User c,
               java.lang.String obs,
               java.lang.String pm)
        This is the constructor of the class.
        name: Receipt.
        pre: the variables listProd, listQ, b, c, obs, pm, are already initialized.
        post: the attributes and relationships of the class have been initialized.
        Parameters:
        b - Is a Client object that references the client buyer of the receipt. b!=null
        c - Is a User object that references the user creator of the receipt. c!=null
        listProd - Is an ArrayList of Product that contains the list of products for the receipt. listProd!=null.
        listQ - Is an ArrayList of Integer that contains the list of quantities of products for the receipt. listQ!=null.
        pm - Is a String variable that contains the payment method of the receipt. pm equals "Efectivo", pm equals "Tarjeta de debito", pm equals "Tarjeta de credito", or pm equals "Transferencia bancaria"
        obs - Is a String variable that contains the observations of the receipt. obs!=null
